Title: Chaos Siege Gargant
Legend: Chaos Siege Gargants are towering, iron-clad brutes. Equipped with immense hooked blades and massive weighted chains, these monstrosities can tear through fortifications and enemy armies with contemptuous ease.
Intro: A Chaos Siege Gargant is armed with Colossal Hook-blades and Lashing Chains.

Rules.Name: Monstrous Ally
Rules.Rule: MONSTROUS ALLY: This unit can be included as an allied unit in an army whose general has the CHAOS keyword.

Rules.Name: Scaling Spikes And Chains
Rules.Fluff: Resembling a living war machine, Siege Gargants are covered in various hooks, spikes and chains that make it easy for them to clamber over high walls and crush obstacles.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESScaling Spikes and Chains: If you carry out a Smash To Rubble monstrous rampage with this model, the terrain feature is demolished on a 2+ instead of a 3+.

Rules.Name: Timber!
Rules.Fluff: Should a gargant fall, it will likely crush anything in its path.
Rules.Rule: If this model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner must pick a point on the battlefield 4" from this model. Each unit within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds unless it is a GARGANT. This model is then removed from play.
